abilities.name: Amphibious.
abilities.description: The firenewt can breathe air and water.

abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting.
abilities.description: The firenewt's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma. It can innately cast mage armor (self only) at will, requiring no material components.

abilities.name: Spellcasting.
abilities.description:
The firenewt is a 3rd-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). It regains its expended spell slots when it finishes a short or long rest. It knows the following warlock spells:
Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, guidance, light, mage hand, prestidigitation
1st-2nd level (2 2nd-level slots): burning hands, flaming sphere, hellish rebuke, scorching ray

abilities.name: Imix's Blessing.
abilities.description: When the firenewt reduces an enemy to 0 hit points, the firenewt gains 5 temporary hit points.
